profile:
Senior software engineer with more than seven years' hands-on experience designing, building and running web platforms. I pair clean TypeScript, PHP and Python with pragmatic tooling such as Docker, and I'm happiest when the uptime graph is flat and deployment logs are uneventful.

At Freelancer.com I look after reliability. The live dashboards I introduced trimmed roughly a third from our incident-response time, and the Docker / Jenkins pipeline I set up turned multi-hour releases into routine ten-minute jobs.

Day-to-day I prune legacy code, improve developer experience by writing scripts that spare the team from repetitive work. The role is a permanent, in-house position at Freelancer.com's UK branch – I'm not a freelancer despite the name.

items.degree: High School Diploma, Mathematics and Informatics Faculty

companies.name: Freelancer.com — In-house, Full-time (Freelancer Outsourcing UK Ltd)

roles.title: Senior Software Engineer
responsibilities: Owned platform stability and on-call process; new real-time dashboards and alert rules cut critical incidents by a quarter.
Re-built key features in Angular and PHP, shaving seconds off page loads and boosting customer satisfaction scores.
Worked side-by-side with product and data teams to turn goals into deliverable technical tasks, helping projects land on schedule.
Replaced manual release steps with Docker and Jenkins automation, reducing deployment time by nearly a third.

roles.title: Full Stack Software Engineer
responsibilities: Built and enhanced full-stack features across Angular, PHP and Python, lifting throughput by around fifteen per cent.
Partnered with the data-science group to expose new analytics that informed product decisions.
Refactored legacy modules, cutting the team's technical-debt backlog by a fifth.

roles.title: Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Implemented Keycloak SSO for backend security and OAuth2 for frontend authentication, enhancing application security
Developed RESTful web services using Spring Boot and configured continuous deployment, accelerating release cycles
Maintained and optimised graph and relational databases (AgensGraph and PostgreSQL), improving data retrieval efficiency by 20%
Standardised frontend development processes and mentored junior developers, improving team productivity

roles.title: Java Developer
responsibilities: Collaborated with international teams to design and extend a specialised Java compiler, enhancing language features
Implemented a custom Integrated Development Environment (IDE) with advanced refactoring capabilities, improving developer efficiency

roles.title: Junior Java Developer
responsibilities: Served as a liaison with German and Slovenian partner companies, facilitating effective communication and collaboration
Assisted in designing and extending a Java compiler in partnership with international teams
Supported the implementation of a specialised IDE featuring refactoring capabilities

roles.title: Junior Software Developer
responsibilities: Transformed FxCop analysis results into user-friendly reports, improving usability and developer adoption
Contributed to the development of a SonarQube plugin for visualising code analysis results, enhancing code quality monitoring

roles.title: Graduate Software Developer
responsibilities: Developed a static code analysis tool in C# using the Roslyn compiler infrastructure, aiding in code quality improvement
Calculated code metrics on a language-independent model in C++, contributing to performance optimisation

projects.title: Collaboration Team Monitoring Dashboards
projects.description: Developed comprehensive monitoring dashboards for enterprise collaboration products, including messaging, groups and project updates. Provided real-time analytics and performance tracking, enabling proactive issue resolution and improved service reliability.

projects.title: PHP Infrastructure Modernisation
projects.description: Containerised legacy PHP applications using Docker, resulting in consistent development environments, simplified deployment processes and enhanced scalability. Reduced environment setup time by 70% and eliminated 'works on my machine' issues.

projects.title: Test Framework Enhancement
projects.description: Upgraded and expanded the functional testing framework, improving test coverage, execution speed and reliability. Implemented automated regression testing that reduced QA cycles by 30% while increasing fault detection.

projects.title: Angular Frontend Migration
projects.description: Successfully led a major version upgrade of the Angular framework across multiple frontend applications. Implemented modern architectural patterns, improved build processes and enhanced performance, resulting in 25% faster load times.
